sub_title: Head of IT Infrastructure Operations - Global at CEVA Logistics
summary:
Profile:
highly self-motivated, and ambitious Infrastructure leader who takes ownership over all areas of responsibility and drives positive change. The core focus is to develop people as they are the key to success and ensure the right technology and processes are in place.

I am an experienced, open-minded, and innovative leader in Global Infrastructure Services. Throughout my career, I have designed, deployed, managed, and improved Global Datacenters, Global Networks, Infrastructure services, HA, and DR solutions. I have an excellent understanding of Infrastructure concepts and services with the ability to translate technical solutions to the managerial level and vice versa. Besides that, I am a great problem solver with strong analytical skills and have a pragmatic approach where needed.

Mission:
I am a person with a deep sense of purpose and value and focused on “doing what matters most”. I am intentional, focused, and proactive in driving this throughout everything I do and what I do with the people I work with.

Background:
I started my career as a Microsoft engineer where I was involved in multiple implementation projects where I successfully delivered and managed new and existing technical solutions. After 5 years I was the lead Architect within my group. As an Architect, I have successfully designed, deployed, and consolidated Global Infrastructure services. 

in 2008 My focus shifted to management where I took the responsibility of a team of engineers responsible for Global Network, Global Backup, and DC Storage systems. 

In 2009 - 2018 I took on the management of CEVAs Global Datacenters delivering Global services for our customers.

In 2017 we started to insource all IT services operating from Manila and As a director, I was responsible for approx 110 experts in IT operations.

After a reorganization in 2019, I am now leading a team of approximately 150 FTE managing the Global INfrastructure for CEVA.

Specialties: Remote/Local People Management, IT Management, Certified, ITIL training (1999), ITIL Foundation v3 (2011), Communication training, Project Management training, Excellent communicator, particularly in connecting IT with the business.

projects.title: Consolidation of Global Datacenters in Europe
projects.description: Ceva is consolidating all of our Datacenters into a small set of Global Datacenters to support our business. The new DC's have been deployed and a large number of our environments are now running from these centralised DC's

We went live in February with a limited amount of transition and the new team is doing an extremely good job.

profile_positions.title: Director IT - Global Service Delivery & Non-microsoft Platform Management

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Global DB Management for CEVA which consists of over 3000 deployed and maintained Databases within the organisation. 

This includes:

- Recruitment and Management of the DBA group of 18 resources in Manila
- Handover R&M support activities between project team and 3rd party to our new team in Manila
- All operational activities around Databases
- Supporting Oracle/SQL/MySQL/PostgreSQL
- License Deployment Management
- Support Agreements
- Incident/Change/Problem management
- Continuous Improvement
- Business alignment
profile_positions.title: Manager - Global Database

profile_positions.description:
Besided running the EDC, Added responsibilities for the Global Datacenters in NL:

The GDC consists of:
 - 2 Datacenters in NL (70km apart)
 - Servers consolidation program ongoing and growing rapidly
- ~200TB+ of Data
 - High speed connections to Inter/Intra/Extranet
 - 2 diversely routed 10Gb interconnects
 - Fully redundant 7/5/2 nexus cores
- State of the art Palo Alto firewall/IPS

This state-of-the-art environment is purpose built to support the Global strategy in reducing the Global Datacenter footprint. In the past year we have consolidated and decommissioned Singapore and Brazil Datacenters and moved the Australia DC to a new facility. 

Besides the application move the support is transitioned to the Global run and maintain team reporting to me.

Current GDC projects:
- Consolidation of Italy Datacenter 
- Consolidation of UK & US applications
- Move of JDEdwards and HFM financial environments
- Redesign of Diadema services to match agreed SLA
- Creation of reference architectures for CEVA core application platforms
- Contract cost reduction opportunities
- Deployment of new Global applications
- Support transition of new environments and align with Global standards.

Completed projects:
- Deployment of CEVA internal cloud services
- Consolidation of Singapore Datacenter
- Consolidation of Brazil Datacenter
- Transition of R&M support for Australia DC's
- Migration of Global applications (Financial Management, sharepoint, etc)
profile_positions.title: Manager - Global and Enterprise Datacenter's

profile_positions.description:
In this position I'm responsible for the Datacenter Operations in Europe which are build out of two location in the Netherlands. Responsible/Service Owner for:

- Overall Data Center Management
- Managing implementation and transition of new services
- Responsible for all Infrastructural components:
* Power/Rack Management
* Exchange
* Citrix
* Operating Systems
* Storage, Backup & Recovery
* Monitoring
* Network
* Supporting Tools

The EDC consists of:
- 2 Datacenters in NL (80km apart)
- 750+ Servers 
- 600TB+ of Data
- High speed connections to Inter/Intra/Extranet
- 2 diversely routed 10Gb interconnects

These infrastructure components support the following Mission critical environments:

- Warehouse Managent Systems (WMS)
- Transport Management Systems (TMS)
- Freight Management Systems (FMS)
- Backoffice systems 
- Financial systems

Overall responsibilities:

- Incident Management
- Change Management
- Problem Management
- Patch Management
- Managing the Operational Teams
- Supplier/Vendor management
- RFP trajects for replacement
- Sev1/2 Incident Management
- Alignment between Business, Infra and App departments
- Contract management
- Client relation management
- Budgetting & Purchasing
- Maintain Global change calendar
- Maintain Global DR calendar
- Participate in Internal and External Audits

Through time In the past 3 years all CEVA engineers have been outsourced under a Time & Material contract. We now have a +150 FTE resources to manage all Global environments. Currently I am managing these teams for the environments in the GDC in making sure the right processes are in place, all activities are completed as agreed and running Infrastructure projects.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Managing the storage and backup Infrastructure for 4 Global Datacenters in Houston, Jacksonville and two Dutch sites and leading the team of Storage and Backup engineers (5 FTE)
- Manage team resources
- Global storage management
- Global backup management
- Global SAN management Datacenters
- RFP selection process to replace all US based Storage arrays
- RFP selection process to implement SRM tooling
- Manage Storage replacement for US based Storage arrays
- Manage Storage resource Management software RFP process
profile_positions.title: Manager Data Storage and Recovery

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Managing the global network and Datacenter Infrastructure and leading the team of Network, security engineers (5FTE) and suppliers.
- Manage team resources
- Global MPLS network management
- Network management Datacenters
- SAN management Datacenters
- Creation, validation and calculation of new services like hosted exchange, Lotus Notes, Authorized internet Access Services, Tiered Storage
- Advise CIO and Datacenter Operational Manager on future steps
- Vendor management
profile_positions.title: Team lead Network Infrastructure

profile_positions.description:
Sr. Network and systems Architect – responsible for all designs and steering the team of support engineers to implement accordingly: 
- Design and implement new Datacenter solutions and broaden service portfolio
- Implementation of  several Transport, Warehouse and Back office environments
- Supporting Management in decisions provide technical guidance
- Managed two RFP selection processes: Datacenter and Storage
- Designed new Dual Datacenter after separation with TNT
- Project Management for several projects:
* Implement Dual Data Center for Europe and first country (Spain)
* Migration to new datacenter including all customer interfacing
* Migration of Business Unit application
profile_positions.title: Senior Network and Systems Architect

profile_positions.description:

- 24x7 network and systems support
Technical Project Manager for several projects e.g.:
- Implementation of Windows 2000 Terminal Services on NT 4.0 domain 
- Implementation of several new logistics sites
- Network migration to MPLS
- Implement Dual Data Center for Benelux
